    • Method Detail

      • calculateSquareAttributes

        public static void calculateSquareAttributes(Path experimentPath,
                                             Recording recording,
                                             GenerateSquaresConfig generateSquaresConfig)
        Calculates attributes for each square in a recording, such as Tau, density, variability, and density ratio. It also applies visibility filtering based on given parameters and assigns label numbers to selected squares.
        Parameters:
        experimentPath - the file path of the current experiment for saving generated files
        recording - the recording containing squares and associated track data
        generateSquaresConfig - the configuration parameters used for generating square attributes and analysis

      • calculateRecordingAttributes

        public static void calculateRecordingAttributes(Recording recording,
                                                GenerateSquaresConfig generateSquaresConfig)
        Calculates various attributes for a recording, including Tau, density, background statistics, and R-squared values. This method processes detailed information about the recording and applies configuration settings to compute the necessary metrics.
        Parameters:
        recording - the recording object containing square and track data to process
        generateSquaresConfig - the configuration parameters for generating square attributes

      • calculateDensityRatio

        public static double calculateDensityRatio(int numberOfTracksInSquare,
                                           double numberOfTracksInBackgroundSquare)

      • calculateVariability

        public static double calculateVariability(tech.tablesaw.api.Table tracks,
                                          int squareNumber,
                                          int numberOfSquaresInRecording,
                                          int granularity)
        Computes the spatial variability of track positions within a selected square of a recording. The square is subdivided into a grid of size `granularity × granularity`, and the count of tracks falling into each grid cell is determined. Variability is then quantified as the coefficient of variation (standard deviation divided by mean) of the cell counts.
        Parameters:
        tracks - A table of track data, including x- and y-coordinate columns.
        squareNumber - The index of the square region within the recording which is being analysed.
        numberOfSquaresInRecording - The total number of spatial squares defined for the recording.
        granularity - The number of subdivisions (cells) along each dimension of the square’s grid.
        Returns:
        The coefficient of variation (σ / μ) of the grid-cell counts; returns 0.0 if the mean cell count is zero (no tracks).
